languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, я, в отличие от лейтенанта Вент, чту иерархию и не считаю себя вправе пререкаться со старшими по званию". {n}Иокаста почтительно склоняет голову в направлении Абеляра. Но, спустя миг, на губах ее возникает змеиная улыбочка.{/n} "Но, хотя я полностью разделяю мнение господина Версериана о том, какой судьбы заслуживает Четвертый Складочный, не могу не отметить, что имеющее место нарушение субординации является прямым продолжением порядков, которые он установил".

"Lord Captain, unlike Lieutenant Vent, I respect the chain of command and realise that it is not within my right to challenge my superiors." {n}Sauerback bows her head in Abelard's direction. However, a moment later, a serpentine smile appears on her lips.{/n} "That being said, while I entirely share Master Werserian's opinion on what fate Depot 4 deserves, I must note that this insubordination is a direct consequence of practices that he himself has introduced."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, я, в отличие от лейтенанта Вент, чту иерархию и не считаю себя вправе пререкаться со старшими по званию". {n}Иокаста почтительно склоняет голову в направлении Абеляра. Но, спустя миг, на губах ее возникает змеиная улыбочка.{/n} "Но, хотя я полностью разделяю мнение господина Версериана о том, какой судьбы заслуживает Четвертый Складочный, не могу не отметить, что имеющее место нарушение субординации является прямым продолжением порядков, которые он установил".

However, a moment later, a serpentine smile appears on her lips.{/n} "That being said, while I entirely share Master Werserian's opinion on what fate Depot 4 deserves, I must note that this insubordination is a direct consequence of practices that he himself has introduced."

However, a moment later, a serpentine smile appears on her lips.{/n} "That being said, while I entirely share Master Werserian's opinion on what fate Depot 4 deserves, I must note that this insubordination is a direct consequence of practices that he himself has introduced."

"Lord Captain, unlike Lieutenant Vent, I respect the chain of command and realise that it is not within my right to challenge my superiors." {n}Sauerback bows her head in Abelard's direction. However, a moment later, a serpentine smile appears on her lips.{/n} "That being said, while I entirely share Master Werserian's opinion on what fate Depot 4 deserves, I must note that this insubordination is a direct consequence of practices that he himself has introduced."

"Lord Captain, unlike Lieutenant Vent, I respect the chain of command and realise that it is not within my right to challenge my superiors." {n}Sauerback bows her head in Abelard's direction. However, a moment later, a serpentine smile appears on her lips.{/n} "That being said, while I entirely share Master Werserian's opinion on what fate Depot 4 deserves, I must note that this insubordination is a direct consequence of practices that he himself has introduced."

languages.text: "Lord Captain, im Gegensatz zu Lieutenant Vent respektiere ich die Befehlskette und weiß, dass es mir nicht zusteht, meine Vorgesetzten infrage zu stellen." {n}Sauerback neigt ihren Kopf in Abelards Richtung. Einen Augenblick später umspielt allerdings ein verschlagenes Lächeln ihre Lippen.{/n} "Davon abgesehen teile ich hinsichtlich des verdienten Schicksals für Depot 4 die Ansicht von Meister Werserian, möchte aber anmerken, dass diese Insubordination eine direkte Folge von Praktiken ist, die er selbst eingeführt hat."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, unlike Lieutenant Vent, I respect the chain of command and realise that it is not within my right to challenge my superiors." {n}Sauerback bows her head in Abelard's direction. However, a moment later, a serpentine smile appears on her lips.{/n} "That being said, while I entirely share Master Werserian's opinion on what fate Depot 4 deserves, I must note that this insubordination is a direct consequence of practices that he himself has introduced."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, im Gegensatz zu Lieutenant Vent respektiere ich die Befehlskette und weiß, dass es mir nicht zusteht, meine Vorgesetzten infrage zu stellen." {n}Sauerback neigt ihren Kopf in Abelards Richtung. Einen Augenblick später umspielt allerdings ein verschlagenes Lächeln ihre Lippen.{/n} "Davon abgesehen teile ich hinsichtlich des verdienten Schicksals für Depot 4 die Ansicht von Meister Werserian, möchte aber anmerken, dass diese Insubordination eine direkte Folge von Praktiken ist, die er selbst eingeführt hat."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, contrairement à la lieutenante Vent, je respecte la chaîne de commandement et je sais pertinemment que je n'ai pas à défier l'autorité de mes supérieurs. » {n}Sauerback incline la tête en direction d'Abélard. L'instant d'après, un sourire serpentin se dessine sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Cela étant dit, si je partage entièrement l'opinion de maître Werserian quant au châtiment qu'il convient d'infliger aux hommes du dépôt 4, je me dois de vous faire remarquer que leur insubordination est une conséquence directe de pratiques qu'il a lui-même introduites. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, unlike Lieutenant Vent, I respect the chain of command and realise that it is not within my right to challenge my superiors." {n}Sauerback bows her head in Abelard's direction. However, a moment later, a serpentine smile appears on her lips.{/n} "That being said, while I entirely share Master Werserian's opinion on what fate Depot 4 deserves, I must note that this insubordination is a direct consequence of practices that he himself has introduced."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, contrairement à la lieutenante Vent, je respecte la chaîne de commandement et je sais pertinemment que je n'ai pas à défier l'autorité de mes supérieurs. » {n}Sauerback incline la tête en direction d'Abélard. L'instant d'après, un sourire serpentin se dessine sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Cela étant dit, si je partage entièrement l'opinion de maître Werserian quant au châtiment qu'il convient d'infliger aux hommes du dépôt 4, je me dois de vous faire remarquer que leur insubordination est une conséquence directe de pratiques qu'il a lui-même introduites. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, a diferencia del teniente Vent, yo respeto la cadena de mando y me hago cargo de que no está entre mis atribuciones porfiar de mis superiores». {n}Sauerback inclina la cabeza en dirección a Abelard. Sin embargo, un instante después sus labios esbozan una sonrisa artera.{/n} «Dicho esto, y aunque comparto enteramente la opinión de maese Werserian sobre el destino que merece el Depósito 4, debo señalar que esta insubordinación es una consecuencia directa de prácticas que ha introducido él mismo».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, unlike Lieutenant Vent, I respect the chain of command and realise that it is not within my right to challenge my superiors." {n}Sauerback bows her head in Abelard's direction. However, a moment later, a serpentine smile appears on her lips.{/n} "That being said, while I entirely share Master Werserian's opinion on what fate Depot 4 deserves, I must note that this insubordination is a direct consequence of practices that he himself has introduced."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, a diferencia del teniente Vent, yo respeto la cadena de mando y me hago cargo de que no está entre mis atribuciones porfiar de mis superiores». {n}Sauerback inclina la cabeza en dirección a Abelard. Sin embargo, un instante después sus labios esbozan una sonrisa artera.{/n} «Dicho esto, y aunque comparto enteramente la opinión de maese Werserian sobre el destino que merece el Depósito 4, debo señalar que esta insubordinación es una consecuencia directa de prácticas que ha introducido él mismo».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、私はヴェント副官と違い、指揮系統を尊重しておりますし、上官に異議を唱える権利はないことを理解しています」{n}ザウアーバックはアベラルドの方へと頭を下げる。しかし次の瞬間、その唇に蛇のような笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「とはいえ、第四倉庫がどんな運命をたどるべきかについてはマスター・ウェルザリアンの意見にまったく同感ですが、この反抗的な態度は、彼自身が導入した観光の直接的な結果であることは言及させていただきましょう」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, unlike Lieutenant Vent, I respect the chain of command and realise that it is not within my right to challenge my superiors." {n}Sauerback bows her head in Abelard's direction. However, a moment later, a serpentine smile appears on her lips.{/n} "That being said, while I entirely share Master Werserian's opinion on what fate Depot 4 deserves, I must note that this insubordination is a direct consequence of practices that he himself has introduced."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、私はヴェント副官と違い、指揮系統を尊重しておりますし、上官に異議を唱える権利はないことを理解しています」{n}ザウアーバックはアベラルドの方へと頭を下げる。しかし次の瞬間、その唇に蛇のような笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「とはいえ、第四倉庫がどんな運命をたどるべきかについてはマスター・ウェルザリアンの意見にまったく同感ですが、この反抗的な態度は、彼自身が導入した観光の直接的な結果であることは言及させていただきましょう」

languages.text: “舰长大人，我与温特中尉不同。我尊重上下级之间的关系，我也明白我无权挑战上级的命令。”{n}苏尔贝克朝阿贝拉德的方向低下了头，但过了一会儿，她的唇角露出了毒蛇一样的微笑。{/n}“话虽如此，但有件事情我希望能说清楚。尽管我完全同意韦尔森大师对四号货栈的处理方式，但我必须指出，正是由于他之前的决定，才直接导致了当下的后果。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, unlike Lieutenant Vent, I respect the chain of command and realise that it is not within my right to challenge my superiors." {n}Sauerback bows her head in Abelard's direction. However, a moment later, a serpentine smile appears on her lips.{/n} "That being said, while I entirely share Master Werserian's opinion on what fate Depot 4 deserves, I must note that this insubordination is a direct consequence of practices that he himself has introduced."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我与温特中尉不同。我尊重上下级之间的关系，我也明白我无权挑战上级的命令。”{n}苏尔贝克朝阿贝拉德的方向低下了头，但过了一会儿，她的唇角露出了毒蛇一样的微笑。{/n}“话虽如此，但有件事情我希望能说清楚。尽管我完全同意韦尔森大师对四号货栈的处理方式，但我必须指出，正是由于他之前的决定，才直接导致了当下的后果。”

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Teğmen Vent'in aksine ben emir komuta zincirine hürmet ederim. Üstlerime meydan okuma hakkım olmadığının da farkındayım." {n}Sauerback, Abelard'ın bulunduğu yöne doğru başını eğiyor. Ancak bir müddet sonra dudaklarında hilekâr bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "4. Depo'nun hak ettiği hüküm hususunda Üstat Werserian'la hemfikirim. Bununla birlikte yaşanan itaatsizliğin doğruca kendisinin uygulamaya koyduğu yöntemlerin sonucu olduğuna dikkat çekmeliyim."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, unlike Lieutenant Vent, I respect the chain of command and realise that it is not within my right to challenge my superiors." {n}Sauerback bows her head in Abelard's direction. However, a moment later, a serpentine smile appears on her lips.{/n} "That being said, while I entirely share Master Werserian's opinion on what fate Depot 4 deserves, I must note that this insubordination is a direct consequence of practices that he himself has introduced."
